snippet.title: Link: Blast Puzzle Game (Android IOS APK)
snippet.description:
Link: Blast Puzzle Game by Ice Storm (Android IOS APK)
LIKE and SUBSCRIBE for more games! Thanks!► http://bit.ly/oglgameplays ◄

Android Download►https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.icestorm.link
APK►https://apkcombo.com/apk-downloader/?q=com.icestorm.link
iPhone/Ipad Download►

🎁 Sign up in advance to GET A SPECIAL BONUS when the game comes out! 🎁 

Welcome to the mysterious world of wild animals, magic and magnificent archaeological excavations. Epic adventure is already waiting! Go!

⭐️ My oh my! The furry rascals 🐈 🐇 have got out, and are making trouble at a real archeological dig. Help the Professor deal with the cute critters so he can discover some real treasure!💎💎💎 The fate of important ancient objects depends on you!

⭐️ Complete one level after another in this great adventure puzzle by arranging the critters in a line. In this game, the familiar Match 3 mechanics will feel like something new!

⭐️ Make combinations of three or more matching critters to get through the level! You can only make a limited number of moves, so plan ahead and be careful. Test your puzzling skills by bringing these cute pets together!

⭐️ Show your talent and inventiveness: pick moves that will earn you a reward in the form of colourful cascading rainbows or explosive fireworks 💣, and feel the joy of victory!

⭐️ Take up the challenge of adventuring with the Professor and his amazing traveling companion on your own, or compete with friends to see who can get the best score! 🥇

⭐️ As you go through one level after another you'll find out what awaits the Professor and his traveling companion in different parts of the world! 

Special features of the game:
✔️ Vivid graphics and colorful animation.
✔️ Create lines—unique new game mechanics for the Match 3 genre!
✔️ Loads of extra quests with even bigger bonuses: puzzles, tasks of the day, time-limited tasks ⌛ and honey levels! 🍯
✔️ Collections of cute pets: puppies 🐕, bunnies 🐇, piglets 🐖, birds 🐦, and loads more!
✔️ Jewels 💎, exploding bombs 💣, and fireworks.
✔️ Incredible boosters and bonus rewards that become available after a group of levels. Make your collection of artefacts!
✔️ Aztec masks 🎭, lucky charms, and other treasures await you when you discover the reward chests!
✔️ An interesting game that takes some skill!
✔️ Leaderboards let you see how your friends and rivals are doing! 🏆
✔️ A simple free game that gets harder with each level.
✔️ Cheerful and relaxing music. 🎧
✔️ Discover amazing places and meet new furry critters.
✔️ The game is in the category of free games. 🆓
✔️ Easy to play, but tough to master! 

#Link #BlastPuzzle #OglGameplays #Oglplays #MobileGames #BestAndroidGames #NewAndroidGames
